summary:
Peter: I really feel like having a pizza right now.
Tony: I know a great place in Italy, I’ll fly you there!
Stephen: You can’t...
body:
Peter: I really feel like having a pizza right now.

Tony: I know a great place in Italy, I’ll fly you there!

Stephen: You can’t fly all the way to Italy that’s ridiculous…

Stephen: I’ll make a portal instead.

reblog.comment:
Peter: I really feel like having a pizza right now.

Tony: I know a great place in Italy, I’ll fly you there!

Stephen: You can’t fly all the way to Italy that’s ridiculous…

trail.content_raw:

Tony: I know a great place in Italy, I’ll fly you there!

Stephen: You can’t fly all the way to Italy that’s ridiculous…

Stephen: I’ll make a portal instead.
trail.content:
Peter: I really feel like having a pizza right now.

Tony: I know a great place in Italy, I’ll fly you there!

Stephen: You can’t fly all the way to Italy that’s ridiculous…

Stephen: I’ll make a portal instead.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Things I said when you were sleeping
title: Things I said when you were sleeping
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LKJvaS

by ThunderBruce

“I’m so in love with you Bruce” he whispered, not even sounding like he meant to say it, as though it was no natural to him, but then quickly finding comfort in the mans unconscious state and knowing that he couldn’t hear him

Except he did.

-

The avengers are having a movie night and Thor finds himself confessing to his sleeping friend, spurred on by the comfort that Bruce can’t hear him…. but he can

Words: 1928, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Thorbruce

  • Fandoms: Marvel, MCU, Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bruce Banner, Thor Odinson, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov, Jarvis (Iron Man movies)
  • Relationships: Thor Odinson x Bruce Banner, Bruce Banner/Thor Odinson, tony Stark/ Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: thorbruce, gammahammer - Freeform, ThunderScience - Freeform, thruce, Thulk, Movie Night, accidental love confession, Fluff, kinda angst, FLUFFFFFF, Stony - Freeform


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LKJvaS

summary: Ok but in IW, tony has this kind of gauntlet constrict that he uses on thanos to prevent him from closing his fist and i was...
body: Ok but in IW, tony has this kind of gauntlet constrict that he uses on thanos to prevent him from closing his fist and i was wondering,, since tony didnt know abt thanos at the beginning of the movie he prob didnt know abt the gauntlet either,, so when he arrived on titan he couldnt possibly have it prepared in advance and ready to use in his armor. Does that mean that with his nanotech suit he can now create new weapons in the middle of a battle??? That would mean that he is litteraly prepared to face any opponent but it would also need a whole new level of armor control on his part,,, which is just,, wow

summary: do you remember when tony said "if we cant protect the earth, you can be damn sure we'll avenge it" in avengers assemble?...
body: do you remember when tony said “if we cant protect the earth, you can be damn sure we’ll avenge it” in avengers assemble? because that’s basically what avengers 4 will be and i have no idea if this is a coincidence or like ultimate foreshadowing™

tags: Fic: How Big How Blue How Beautiful
summary: Hey, do you have any head canons about Tony Stark? Or anything you want to talk about him, I love when people talk about their...
question: Hey, do you have any head canons about Tony Stark? Or anything you want to talk about him, I love when people talk about their favorite characters it always shows an interesting side of them. Sorry if my English is a mess
answer:
OH I LOVE TALKING ABOUT MY FAVES! *^*

Headcanons for Tony, huh? That’s actually a nice idea. Let’s see how many of them actually make it into “How Big, How Blue, How Beautiful”…

I mean, I subscribe to many of the fandom-wide headcanons about Tony.

Him mentoring Peter to the point of being a father-figure to his Spider-Son. That’s just so beautiful and between Homecoming and Infinity War, it’s actually canon than headcanon, really. And I live for it.

I love the Science Bros, but I’d personally add Jane. Just. Tony, Bruce and Jane geeking out about science while Darcy provides coffee and occasionally (unhealthy) food for them.

Tony and Darcy? Hit it off. Totally! She’s going to be a type of social media PR manager for the Avengers in my fic. So she’s definitely enjoying living in the Avengers Mansion… where they moved after the Civil War fiasco. And she is just very unapologetic, something that Tony really needs in his life. Like, “Well, fuck Steve for leaving you. He doesn’t deserve you” kind of unapologetic.

Tony moving into a gorgeous mansion in New York after selling the tower. The Avengers Mansion. Starting anew. Gathering a new team who is actually worthy of him.

I think that Tony and T’Challa have the potential for a beautiful friendship and I need that in my life, at the very least (you know, when it’s not a ship). And he would straight up adore Shuri.

Honestly? I have the headcanon that his suit in Infinity War? Yeeeah, it was born after late-night science spitballing with Shuri. It had the kitten-cannons Shuri made in Black Panther and the nanobot tech that the Black Panther suit has. Now, while I don’t believe that he stole any of her ideas, but that it was friendly encouragement and helping each other out.

I also think that Shuri admires Tony. Sure, she’s “more of a genius” than him. But… that doesn’t mean you can’t admire what someone else achieves? Especially considering he built the first suit in a cave out of scrap metal. For Shuri, who always has the most modern tech at her disposal to work with, I do believe that is a feat she highly respects. Because she’s a cool and decent human being unlike most of the fandom who as soon as it was confirmed she had a higher IQ than Tony had the need to pitch them against each other for some fucked up reason.

Since I am writing a Loki/Tony fic atm, I’d pairing-wise focus my headcanons on that too.

Loki, super protective of Tony. Fucking with Rogers and his Rogues. Especially with the damn witch. Not that Tony knows (…or is supposed to know).

Also: Hela (alternate Hela because fuck Ragnarök HARD; Hela is not Odin’s daughter, she is Loki’s daughter. *slaps the Marvel OC Aldrif’s name onto Cait Blanchet’s character) totally being fond of Tony. Calling him her merchant.

Hela and Peter teaming up on Tony, who feels very much like a dad all of a sudden - and Loki is super not helpful.

Huh… I can’t currently think of more, to be honest. ^^°

Especially considering he built the first suit in a cave out of scrap metal. For Shuri, who always has the most modern tech at her disposal to work with, I do believe that is a feat she highly respects. Because she’s a cool and decent human being unlike most of the fandom who as soon as it was confirmed she had a higher IQ than Tony had the need to pitch them against each other for some fucked up reason.

Since I am writing a Loki/Tony fic atm, I’d pairing-wise focus my headcanons on that too.

Loki, super protective of Tony. Fucking with Rogers and his Rogues. Especially with the damn witch. Not that Tony knows (…or is supposed to know).

Also: Hela (alternate Hela because fuck Ragnarök HARD; Hela is not Odin’s daughter, she is Loki’s daughter. *slaps the Marvel OC Aldrif’s name onto Cait Blanchet’s character) totally being fond of Tony. Calling him her merchant.

Hela and Peter teaming up on Tony, who feels very much like a dad all of a sudden - and Loki is super not helpful.

Huh… I can’t currently think of more, to be honest. ^^°

blog.title: The Futurist and The Man Out of Time.

tags: thank u for coming to my ted talk
summary: Anyway Tony Stark is kind, Tony Stark is selfless, Tony Stark learns from his mistakes, Tony Stark tries so hard to better...
body: Anyway Tony Stark is kind, Tony Stark is selfless, Tony Stark learns from his mistakes, Tony Stark tries so hard to better himself and keep everyone safe, Tony Stark has a beautiful character arc that is so incredibly visceral and human and imperfect, Tony Stark is a hero, Tony Stark puts everyone else before himself, Tony Stark was a good man before Afghanistan, Tony Stark was a good man after Afghanistan, Tony Stark is flawed like every human is, Tony Stark is the best fucking representation of broken humans with issues and flaws managing to mould themselves into heroes and role models despite the setbacks they face, despite tripping up sometimes, despite being wrong and making mistakes- he is the soul of the fucking Avengers and the heart of the entire mcu

blog.name: emanationman
blog.title: MOVED TO @THESWEETESTDEFENDER
blog.description: @thesweetestdefender

summary:
I wanna write a WinterIron AU where Steve and Tony are exes and share custody of a kid.
Like maybe Tony was in grad school and...
body:
I wanna write a WinterIron AU where Steve and Tony are exes and share custody of a kid.

Like maybe Tony was in grad school and finishing up his dissertation when he meets ex military Steve, a little younger than Tony maybe 6 or seven years, and falls head over heels in like no time. It’s not a proud moment when he has to tell Steve his condoms may not have been enough and that he’s preggo as an eggo and so they decide to marry. Maube Steve’s mom wouldn’t approve otherwise, maybe Howard wouldn’t, either way, But living in New York on Steve’s construction job check and an entry level tech job that Tony was able to snag isn’t easy. The baby comes, the baby grows, but the relationship really can’t last. They fight often enough that Mrs. Crabtree from downstairs calls the police more than once. It’s never violent, but it’s rarely peaceful. Peter turns 4 and on his birthday, Steve brings up the idea of separation, something temporary, something that may save them, but Tony knows that that won’t happen.

They’re divorced three months later and are now sharing custody.

Cut to maybe 3 years later? And Tony, tired of feeling stuck between his stalled out career, his asshole of an ex husband, and a 7 year old looks more like his dad every day, decides he needs to start dating again. But being 35, divorced, and a single father really does crimp his style, so he let’s Natasha from his job set him up. Some guy from R&D that just started, in fact he only just arrived stateside from working abroad.

Enter Bucky (“please call me James, haven’t been Bucky since high school) and whoo, do they hit it off. Bucky’s whip smart and kind. They can talk for hours a night and walk into work at the same time just to be romantic losers. Great with the idea of Peter and has a smile that makes Tony flush like he hasn’t in years.

So he decides to take the plunge and introduce him to Peter, but to his horror not only does Peter already know James, he seems to know him as Uncle Bucky.

"How do you know my son?” Tony asks nearing the hugging pair, kneeling beside them where Peter tackled James to the ground.

James eyes widen comically as he sets Perer back down.

“You’re Petey’s dad?” He asks instead of answering. The hardset of his mouth and the unhappy wrinkle between his eyes means bad things for Tony. “That means, shit, you’re Steve’s ex.”

“How do you know Steve?” Tony asks pleading for an answer that doesn’t bring about any unnecessary drama or heartache into Tony’s already hectic life.

“We grew up together, we even served together.” James says, voice quiet and eyes cast away as he watches Peter run off to watch cartoons upstairs. “He’s like a brother.”

“I was married to him, for 4 years, and he never mentioned you, not once. I would distinctly remember him mentioning a fucking brother from the army!”

“We drifted apart, after the service. He came home and I-” James looked down and around the half messy living room, eyes catching on the pictures of Peter through the years. Pictures that included everyone in Peter’s life except his other father. “We made amends last year, when I came back. He was already divorced, from you, I guess. I met Petey then.”

“You’re my ex husband’s best friend.” Tony said finally. Sitting down on his lumpy couch he’d carried over from his own school days. “Of course you are.”

title: Quite from upcoming fanfic
body:
“So what this all boils down to,” Tony interrupted. “Is no pissing off the murderous death kitten.”
“Death kitten?” Everett muttered.
“Seriously. Up until the knife he looked like a half-drowned kitten.”
